name: DesignerEyewear
tag_list: designer-sunglasses, prescription-sunglasses, prescription-glasses, prescription-eyewear, ray-ban-sunglasses, ray-ban-glasses, prada-sunglasses, prada-eyewear, mens-glasses, ray-ban, gucci-glasses, gucci-eyewear, gucci-sunglasses
overview:
Designer Eyewear was established and run by Stewart Clough, who has been a Registered UK Optician for over 25 years, after realising that the internet was allowing people to search for and buy a far wider range of the Designer frames than is normally found in a typical ‘High St’ optical practice and from the convenience of their own home. He decided that it made sense to display his own vast range of designer frames online and the rest is history.

At Desingereyewear.co.uk you find famous branded sunglasses for man and woman.
